page.title: 05 Spare-time 80's Style
page.content: We found out what people did in their spare time.We did this by asking people to pick their three favourite pastimes from a list of twenty-four different activities.They included{ {sports,}such as{football,swimming and {keep-fit,}and less active things like{ {bingo and watching television.} We stood outside by a busy road and asked people to answer our questions. From our results we found out that {football was the most popular pastime. Other favourite activities were{ {swimming,snooker,dancing and watching {television.} Our biggest surprise was that most women voted for football we thought it would be bingo!
